description: Recently switched to Kubuntu and this is icing on the cake. No more checking my phone to know I can safely ignore whatever just made it buzz!
Some connection issues, make sure firewall rules are made. Still having notification and accept issues. Not flawless startup and go yet.
summary: Rough around the edges but great concept and fully loaded!

description: could not see my device.

I used to this a lot. But sometime doesn't connect automaticly just after I refresh a few time manually. 
Another bug. When I first used the remote mouse on the mobile work as fine. Now it have a problem on a second monitor. On the notebook monitor still work fine, but if I enter the second one just stuck on right and can't use on.

I get notifications on my phone and pc. It lets me transfer files back and forth. 

Super useful, it lets me copy things back and forth using clipboard. As in text, which is a real time saver. 

Lets me see and send text messages on my computer. 

Works to use my phone as a mouse to control my computer. 

Is it perfect? No by all means it has a couple little issues here and there. But Id be unhappy living my life without it! 

Grab it and make your life a little easier!

Great, now how can I get to work?
Do I have to have a computer degree?
Straight up does not work
This works great with all my Android devices.

It is working very fine as always with my Android phone, however, the connections between my laptop and my desktop is failing (it was working fine before). What's failing between my Desktop and Laptop?
File transfers. It stays sending files forever.
They are not pairing automatically.
The connection is lost and the device is not trusted, even after to click refresh button.

I have read that this issues were solved in Kde Connect versions for 20.10 (and other non lts versions). It would be nice having an update of the LTS version with the fixes too. (If I could only help on this kind of things, be sure I will help but I am missing the knowledge :( ).
summary: The only piece that is missing to my Kubuntu 20.04 to be perfect

description: I got rid of it as some point because I did not really use it. As I recall it cleaned out my phone of pictures which I really didn't want. But CSConnect looked promising so I reinstalled KDE and nothing works. I can send Bluetooth from my laptop to my phone but KDE does not detect any devices. Oh well.
summary: Used it a year ago right out of the box, this time, nothing

description: Unreliable, for sure. Not really practical if I have to go chasing troubleshooting ideas down online when I just want to send an MP3 to my phone....any WORKING alternatives out there?
summary: Worked great the first time. Hasn't worked since

description: Doesn't work, statistically not verified for clients. Need improvement!

I had to switch from ZorinOS to Ubuntu and I loved Zorin Connect. Zorin Connect looks like a derivative of KDE just as Zorin OS is based on Ubuntu, but Zorin Connect works without issue. KDE barely ever connects, it cross threads messages. I really miss Zorin OS.
In beginning it worked quiet well for a few days. But now for no reason at all KDE-Connect doens't start anymore!
KDE-Connect ist perfekt dafür geeignet, um Dateien zwischen Handy und Computer auszutauschen, die Zwischenablage zu teilen und vielem mehr. Mit meinem Google Pixel 5 funktioniert alles einwandfrei.
summary: Sehr gut funktionierende Synchronisation mit Android

description: Leider immer Verbindungsabbrüche und Dateien zu transferieren klappt aktuell mit Iphone nicht.
ta potenteeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
I'm using ubuntu 20.04 and I cannot send files to my android phone. Both devices are connected, phone can send files to the laptop but not in the other way.

resulta que se puede pero tienes que dar click en el icono de kde y despues sen file

en el celular debes indicar la carpeta de transferencia

Application intéressante mais au fonctionnement malheureusement aléatoire.
Je ne m'étendrai pas sur la fonctionnalité de SMS, qui semble condamnée à ne jamais marcher, mais plutôt sur KDE Connect lui-même, qui refuse de démarrer sur PC, que ce soit KDE Connect ou l'indicateur. 
Quand l'application fonctionne (ça arrive), rien à dire. Mais de façon aléatoire, elle ne démarre pas ...
